Text: Thank you SO much!!!  I look for your torrents every week.  I really appreciate them!
I am with js49.  I check for your books everyday.  Love the work.

I share the comments and also look forward to your weekly uploads.   

I know that getting non-fiction is harder than fiction and with so many great books now being released on the NY Times non-fiction list, this is a loss.

Regardless, keep up the good work and hopefully more non-fiction will become available in the future.
These are awesome, keep up the great work!
can you please upload the series "lionboy" by zizou corder, book 1,2 and 3 in epub?
